EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Questionnaire - Symbol Coding-Raw score.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Questionnaire - Verbal Fluency-Total number of Verbal Fluency items.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Questionnaire - Verbal Fluency-Category instances.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Questionnaire - Verbal Fluency-Letter fluency 1.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia Questionnaire - Verbal Fluency-Letter fluency 2.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia - Digit Sequencing-Number of correct sequences.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia - Verbal Memory-Number of items recalled on each trial.
Brief Assessment of Cognition in Schizophrenia - Verbal Memory-Total number of items recalled.
